summary: The test suite validates the OpenSearch Ingestion Service (OSIS) client and server functionality. It uses mocked AWS services to test pipeline lifecycle operations (create, delete, retrieve, list, tag, start, stop, update) and error handling for the client, and runs a simulated server environment to confirm that API endpoints return expected JSON responses and HTTP status codes under various scenarios.
business_intent: To guarantee that the OSIS API behaves correctly and robustly, ensuring reliable pipeline management and proper server responses before deployment in production.
